title: Kaette Kite yoo Toyama kara
synopsis: Perorich is a dog-detective which his own private agency in Tokyo. He returns to Toyama City for a case but in doing so, explores the and "finds" the charm of the prefecture. The anime is a commissioned project by Toyama City in order to promote tourism.
related_anime: ['Taka no Tsume-dan, Toyama', 'Kitty-chan wo Sagase! Toyama-shi Stamp Rally']
